== Description ==
Display the post title in the feed. 

== Usage ==
%%%<?php the_title_rss() ?>%%%

== Parameters ==
None.

== Return Values ==
; (void) : This function does not return a value.

<!-- Need creative examples. Feel free to link to external examples. -->

* Uses: [[Function_Reference/get_the_title_rss|<tt>get_the_title_rss()</tt>]] Used to retrieve current post title.

Since: 0.71

== Source File ==

<tt>the_title_rss()</tt> is located in {{Trac|wp-includes/feed.php}}.
